name: Derek Fai Wong
content: Fai WONG, Derek – Faculty of Science and Technology | University of Macau Skip to content Fai WONG, Derek黃輝 Professor Associate Head of Department of Computer and Information Science (CIS) Personal Homepage: https://www.fst.um.edu.mo/personal/derek-wong/ Academic Qualification Ph.D. in Control Science and Engineering, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China (2005) M.Sc. in Software Engineering, University of Macau, Macao, China (1999) B.Sc. in Software Engineering, University of Macau, Macao, China (1995) Research Research Interests Natural Language Processing, Computational Linguistics Neural Machine Translation, Representation Learning, Multi-lingual Encoding Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Unsupervised Learning Contact Details Faculty of Science and Technology University of Macau, E11 Avenida da Universidade, Taipa, Macau, China Room: E11-4010 Telephone: (853) 8822-4478 Fax: (853) 8822-2426 Email: derekfw Page load link Go to Top
